---
title: "Percentage of interviewees from sensitized communities"
output: html_notebook
---
```{r}
library(haven)
exit <- read_dta("~/Desktop/IPA/Exit Survey/Exit_Survey_Jun27.dta")
community <- as.data.frame(exit$community_name)

## create a dummy variable indicating whether the caregiver is from a sensitized community
sensitized_comm <- ifelse(exit$community_name==0|exit$community_name=="Other",0,1)
table(sensitized_comm)

pct_sensitized <-round(table(sensitized_comm)[2]/nrow(community),4)*100
print(paste(pct_sensitized, "% of interviewees are from sensitized communities"))
```
